content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Maryam Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: Hello Maryam Abbasi, I'm glad you're interested in my apartment. Let's start with the rental price. I'm sure you'll find it's quite high for such a prime location.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand the desirability of the location but would like to explore the possibility of a more cost-effective option. Could we discuss a potentially lower price, given my circumstances as a student?
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran

content: I understand your situation, but I'm afraid I can't offer you a lower price due to your status as a student. I want to get the highest price possible for my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the landlord's inflexibility in considering my situation makes it difficult for me to pursue renting the apartment. TERMINATE
name: Maryam Abbasi from Iran
